instruction.value: For colonoscopy before noon: Take at 5:00 PM on day before procedure.
For colonoscopy before noon: Take at 10:00 PM on day before procedure.
For colonoscopy after noon (12:00PM): Take at 7:00 PM on day before procedure.
For colonoscopy after noon (12:00PM): Take at 6:00 AM on day of procedure..

AdditionalNotes.value: Mix powder with 150 mL fluid. Follow each dose with 1.5 to 2 L of clear fluids.
